gobblin.runtime.locks

Class ZookeeperBasedJobLock

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.runtime.locks.ZookeeperBasedJobLock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobLock, ListenableJobLock, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class ZookeeperBasedJobLock
extends Object
implements ListenableJobLock
    An implementation of JobLock that uses Zookeeper.
